name: Collective Standard
description: A set of similar material measures or measuring instruments fulfilling, by their combined use, the role of a standard. https://www.wmo.int/pages/prog/www/IMOP/publications/CIMO-Guide/Prelim_2018_ed/8_I_1_en_MR_clean.pdf

name: International Standard
description: Measurement standard recognized by signatories to an international agreement and intended to serve worldwide. https://www.wmo.int/pages/prog/www/IMOP/publications/CIMO-Guide/Prelim_2018_ed/8_I_1_en_MR_clean.pdf

name: Primary Standard
description: Measurement standard established using a primary reference measurement procedure, or created as an artifact, chosen by convention. https://www.wmo.int/pages/prog/www/IMOP/publications/CIMO-Guide/Prelim_2018_ed/8_I_1_en_MR_clean.pdf

name: Reference Standard
description: Measurement standard designated for the calibration of other measurement standards for quantities of a given kind in a given organization or at a given location. https://www.wmo.int/pages/prog/www/IMOP/publications/CIMO-Guide/Prelim_2018_ed/8_I_1_en_MR_clean.pdf

name: Secondary Standard
description: Measurement standard established through calibration with respect to a primary measurement standard for a quantity of the same kind. https://www.wmo.int/pages/prog/www/IMOP/publications/CIMO-Guide/Prelim_2018_ed/8_I_1_en_MR_clean.pdf

name: Transfer Standard
description: Device used as an intermediary to compare measurement standards. https://www.wmo.int/pages/prog/www/IMOP/publications/CIMO-Guide/Prelim_2018_ed/8_I_1_en_MR_clean.pdf

name: Travelling Standard
description: Measurement standard, sometimes of special construction, intended for transport between different locations. https://www.wmo.int/pages/prog/www/IMOP/publications/CIMO-Guide/Prelim_2018_ed/8_I_1_en_MR_clean.pdf

name: Working Standard
description: Measurement standard that is used routinely to calibrate or verify measuring instruments or measuring systems. https://www.wmo.int/pages/prog/www/IMOP/publications/CIMO-Guide/Prelim_2018_ed/8_I_1_en_MR_clean.pdf

name: National Standard
description: Measurement standard recognized by national authority to serve in a state or economy as the basis for assigning quantity values to other measurement standards for the kind of quantity concerned. https://www.wmo.int/pages/prog/www/IMOP/publications/CIMO-Guide/Prelim_2018_ed/8_I_1_en_MR_clean.pdf
